/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and depth to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and creating a network of lines against the sky. The sky itself is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
